plugins.punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
plugins.description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.
plugins.name: Splatoon

plugins.punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs
plugins.description:
[Important!] Please disable AND uninstall any non-preview version if you'd like to install this version.

This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yomishino/MyDalamudPlugins/main/plugins.json)
plugins.name: Aether Compass [Preview] [Aku API 7]

A collection of useful tools for roleplayers.

- Choose a PF or use the /route command to set a destination and get
  told the fastest way to navigate to any house.
- Enable click-to-examine on left or right click.
- Prevent untargeting or changing your target.
- Set any emote on your hotbar, such as sleep or object sit.
- Add the /emoteid command to use any emote by its ID.
- Disable the /doze emote snap so you can use the sleep emote
  anywhere.

plugins.description:
Plugin che permette ai giocatori di accedere facilmente a delle guide scritte per i vari content come Dungeon, Trials and Alliance Raids. Punti Chiave: 1) Apre la guida (se presente) in maniera automatica quando si entra in duty 2) Interfaccia scalabile e adattabile a tutti gli schermi 3) una modalità di guida testuale breve per chi è di fretta 4) Protezione Anti-Spoiler 5) Editor guide integrato 6) Integrazioni coi vostri plugin preferiti e molto altro!
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ffxivita/XIVITADalamudPlugins/main/dist/pluginmaster.json)

E tanto altro.

plugins.description:
Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Plugin does not comes with any preconfigured presets, you are required to either make them or import them.

plugins.punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
plugins.description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.

plugins.punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs
plugins.description:
[Important!] Please disable AND uninstall any non-preview version if you'd like to install this version.

This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
plugins.name: Aether Compass [Preview]

plugins.punchline: Adds a better macro system to the game.
plugins.name: Macrology
plugins.description:
Adds a better macro system to the game.

Macrology allows for macros of infinite length, adds looping,
allows comments, supports pausing, allows you to run multiple
macros at once, and supports fractional waits.

plugins.punchline: The Roleplayer's Toolbox
plugins.description:
A collection of useful tools for roleplayers.

- Choose a PF or use the /route command to set a destination and get
  told the fastest way to navigate to any house.
- Enable click-to-examine on left or right click.
- Prevent untargeting or changing your target.
- Set any emote on your hotbar, such as sleep or object sit.
- Add the /emoteid command to use any emote by its ID.
- Disable the /doze emote snap so you can use the sleep emote
  anywhere.
plugins.name: The Roleplayer's Toolbox

plugins.punchline: Queue up crafts! Set and forget!
plugins.name: Mastercraft
plugins.description:
Mastercraft will handle your tedious crafting for you. Import rotations with
specific food and pot, then queue up all the crafts you need. Mastercraft
automatically refreshes food and pots as necessary, and it crafts faster than
a macro ever could!

- Pauseable queue system for crafts
- Byregot's protection on specialists with delineations (optional)
- Skip quality actions when quality is already maxed (optional)
- Macro importer
- Pre-queue sanity checks (have stats, have gearset, have food, etc.)
- Fastest possible crafting time
- View all crafter gearset stats on one screen
- Automatically switch job, use food/pot, start craft
- Can use your computer (and to a lesser degree your game) while it runs

plugins.punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs
plugins.description:
[Important!] Please disable AND uninstall any non-preview version if you'd like to install this version.

This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yomishino/MyDalamudPlugins/main/plugins.json)
plugins.name: Aether Compass [Preview] [Aku API 7]

plugins.punchline: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices
plugins.description:
Plugin for simplifying "pennying" (undercutting current lowest offer by 1).

The usual workflow for this is the following:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Take a mental note of what the current lowest offer is
4. Subtract one from it
5. Close the current listings window
6. Update your item's price with the number you noted
7. Confirm your new price

This plugin eliminates the mental notekeeping steps in the middle by automatically copying the number you want onto your clipboard when you open the current listings window.  

Therefore, your new workflow becomes this:
1. Open up the adjust price menu for the item you're undercutting
2. Click on the compare prices menu to view the current listings
3. Close the current listings window
4. Paste the undercut value in
5. Confirm your new price

This both speeds up the process and reduces room for error from typos.
plugins.name: Penny Pincher

plugins.punchline: Turn your Elgato Stream Deck into a hotbar!
plugins.description:
This plugin allows players to use an Elgato Stream Deck as a virtual utility hot bar. Actions are called directly, meaning there is no need to set up awkward keybinds, custom macros, or any other settings.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
plugins.name: XIVDeck

plugins.punchline: Display alerts upon reaching configurable currencies thresholds (such as Poetics or PVP marks).
plugins.description: This plugin lets you easily manage your various currencies to prevent from wasting precious resources.
plugins.name: CurrencyAlert

plugins.punchline: Changes in-game dialogue to reference your desired gender and name.
plugins.description:
Your character is personal, so you should be able to have NPCs refer to them
the way that you want. With PrefPro, you can control which text option
will appear when an NPC uses dialogue meant for a specific in-game gender.
This allows you to use a female player model and be referred to as male, and
vice versa. In addition, there are a few name customization options - if you
want to only be referred to by your last name, so be it.
Note: This plugin currently will not swap voiced cutscene dialogue.
plugins.name: PrefPro

plugins.punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!
plugins.description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
plugins.name: Redirect

plugins.punchline: Chat and game dialogue TTS plugin.
plugins.description: Chat and game dialogue TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.
plugins.name: TextToTalk

plugins.punchline: Adds a button and a command to minimize your game into taskbar
plugins.description: Additionally can minimize game to tray or create game's tray icon
plugins.name: Mini

plugins.punchline: Larger personal debuffs
plugins.description: Scales up buffs/debuffs applied by you on Target Status frames
plugins.name: BigPlayerDebuffs

plugins.punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
plugins.description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.
plugins.name: ezWondrousTails

plugins.punchline: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap
plugins.description: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap. Customise the markers and toggle whether you want to see friends, FC members, or both, in the settings! Icon by @Miendoodle on twitter. Thanks nya for the idea!
plugins.name: Mini-Mappingway

plugins.punchline: Rename abilities and status effects.
plugins.description: Rename abilities and status effects.
plugins.name: Namingway

plugins.punchline: Browse the market board from anywhere.
plugins.description: Browse the market board. /pmb to open.
plugins.name: Market board

plugins.punchline: Finish your sightseeing log.
plugins.description:
Tourist adds a window to assist with the sightseeing log.

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

Icon: sightseeing by muhammad from the Noun Project
plugins.name: Tourist

plugins.punchline: Display profiles from Chaos Archives (Europe region) in-game
plugins.description: A plugin for Europe region roleplayers, displaying profiles from Chaos Archives (chaosarchives.org) for characters with the RP flag on.
plugins.name: RPP - Roleplay Profiles

plugins.punchline: Take control of your shadows!
plugins.description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
plugins.name: Better Shadows

plugins.punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing.
plugins.description:
Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations
via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions.
plugins.name: GatherBuddy

plugins.punchline: Filter fly texts and pop-ups texts based on multiple criteria and allow the adjustment of their positions.
plugins.description: Filter fly texts and pop-ups texts based on multiple criteria and allow the adjustment of their positions.
plugins.name: FlyTextFilter

plugins.punchline: Use chat away from the game.
plugins.description:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.
plugins.name: XIVChat Server

plugins.punchline: Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.
plugins.description:
Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Icon: Map by Adrien Coquet from the Noun Project
plugins.name: Globetrotter

plugins.punchline: Stops controller input from freezing randomly.
plugins.description:
Stops controller input from freezing randomly by ensuring FFXIV only polls for controllers when one is actually connected or disconnected.

Original plugin by PGGB, icon from Mutant Standard.
plugins.name: DeviceChangeFix

plugins.punchline: Configure sounds for critical and direct hits, plus some countdown music.
plugins.description:
* Set sounds and flavor text to be played/shown whenever you deal direct or critical damage or heal.
* Set sounds to be played when a countdown is in progress.
* Use different configurations by job.
* Use the game's SFX or your own custom WAV or MP3 files.
plugins.name: Hit it, Joe! (Formerly TF2-ish Critical Hits Plugin)

plugins.punchline: See item marketboard prices on hover!
plugins.description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.
plugins.name: Price Insight

plugins.punchline:
[REQUIRES TF2 INSTALLED FOR MOST FEATURES] The Mann Brothers just found a deposit of gravel in Eorzea
and hired YOU, Mercenary of Light, to help them FIGHT for it.
plugins.description:
* Show a Win Panel (with sounds!) when you clear or get wiped in a duty.
* Show a TF2-style timer while in a duty.
* Enable the "Voice Lines" module (via /tfconfig) to have voice lines play when certain conditions are met. What conditions, you ask? It's a surprise! (Unless you uncheck the "Surprise me!" box.)
* More features maybe soon?

Note: This plugin uses files from a local Team Fortress 2 installation.
It'll search for the game's installation folder in all configured Steam Library Folders automatically.

Without a TF2 install, the Timer and Win Panel will work with FF XIV fonts, and no voice line will work.
plugins.name: Team Fortress Fantasy

plugins.punchline: Improve your Island Sanctuary experience.
plugins.description:
A plugin to improve Island Sanctuary. Features:

- Mark items to gather on the proper map
- Gathering & crafting todo-list, showing you what mats you require
- (planned) Better inventory view
- Widget for quick access to information

Icon from the Mutant Standard project.
plugins.name: ReSanctuary

plugins.punchline: Quickly price check your items.
plugins.description:
To check prices, hold your keybind and then hover over an item or via the item's context menu.
The prices are pulled from the crowd-sourced site Universalis.
plugins.name: PriceCheck

plugins.punchline: Helps you track your daily hunt bills
plugins.description: A daily hunt bill tracker
plugins.name: Hunt Buddy

plugins.punchline: Control OBS by websocket
plugins.description: A plugin to control OBS by WebSocket, streaming with any UI modification is not recommended.
plugins.name: OBSPlugin

plugins.punchline: Character task timers.
plugins.description:
Keep track of retainer, airship, submersible, aetherial wheel and crop timers
as well as several miscallaneous tasks of multiple characters.
plugins.name: Accountant

plugins.punchline: Adblock for FFXIV.
plugins.description:
Customisable chat and Party Finder filtering. In addition to letting
you filter anything from chat and PF, it comes with built-in filters
for the following:

- RMT (both gil and content)
- FC ads
- RP ads
- Phishing messages
- Static recruitment
- Trade ads
- Community ads
- Any PF with an item level over the max
plugins.name: NoSoliciting

plugins.punchline: Limit Framerate while out of combat
plugins.description:
Tired of your GPU melting your face off while just running around? Why render at 240 FPS when you're just staring at that gathering node? Fret no more! Chill Frames allows you dynamically limit your framerate when doing unimportant tasks!

/pcf help → Display all available commands
plugins.name: Chill Frames

plugins.punchline: Get aurally rewarded when you get commended on duties.
plugins.description:
Get aurally rewarded when you get commended on duties.

Comes with default sounds for when you get commended by 1/3, 2/3, 3/3 or all seven members of the duty you were in, but you can set custom sounds for each type of trigger by opening /congratsconfig.

The fractioned values are in relation to how many of those members could commend you (i.e. excluding those that were in your party before joining the duty).
plugins.name: Congratulations

plugins.punchline: Want to check where you can obtain materials? This is the plugin for you!
plugins.description: Check where you can obtain a material from monsters, duties, crafting, gathering or where they can be bought from NPCs.
plugins.name: Monster Loot Hunter

plugins.punchline: owo for your chat
plugins.description: This plugin uwu's your chat.
plugins.name: OwO

plugins.punchline: Target distance widgets.
plugins.description: Displays the distance in yalms to the target (or optionally to the target's ring), and can display distance until aggro range for supported bosses.
plugins.name: Distance

plugins.punchline: Easily Track Daily and Weekly tasks
plugins.description:
Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.

/dd help → Display all available commands
plugins.name: Daily Duty

plugins.punchline: Currently supports notifications: chat messages, approaching map flag, duty found, ending of cutscenes, gp restoration, error during logging in, mob has been pulled.
plugins.description: Notifies you about various events while your game is minimized.
plugins.name: NotificationMaster

plugins.punchline: PvP, but in PvE!
plugins.description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu
plugins.name: XIV Combo

plugins.punchline: south spot best spot
plugins.description:
Guaranteed to be safe, unless it isn't. No refunds. 

[ Any Way the Wind Blows (Fungah) is a Gold Saucer Gate 
  There are variations of AOE patterns that can occur 
  There is no real 'safe spot', but there are spaces where there is less overlap by these potential AOEs 
  One of these spots is marked by this plugin when you are in the GATE ]
plugins.name: Fungah

plugins.punchline: Browser overlays rendered in-game.
plugins.description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.
plugins.name: Browsingway

plugins.punchline: Duty-specific notes!
plugins.description:
Lets you create notes that are linked to specific duties (they will only show during those duties).
You can also tie notes to certain jobs so they only appear when on the right job.
plugins.name: NOTED

plugins.punchline: Electric Boogaloo - ♪ A whole new chat, a new fantastic chat window ♪
plugins.description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin. It
supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)
plugins.name: Chat 2

plugins.punchline: basically a hunt radar + train recorder + notifications + s rank utils +++.
plugins.description: Hunt map with spawns points, A-Rank train recorder (w/ export/import sharing), TTS, Chat notifications, Counters for S-Rank Spawns
plugins.name: Hunt Helper

plugins.punchline: Highlighting of Raises and detrimental status effects.
plugins.description:
Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who,
who is already resurrected,
and who has removable detrimental status effects in the world 
as well as in the group or alliance interface.
plugins.name: RezPls

plugins.punchline: Ever wanted detailed information on your playtime all the way down to the second?
plugins.description:
Provides expanded functionality to seamlessly track total playtime.
      Use /btime once on each character to add them.

      - Supports multiple characters,
      - Customisable output formats such as hours or minutes
      - Automatic playtime tracking after character got registered
      - Simple window to see current session playtime
      - Server Info Bar integration
plugins.name: Better Playtime

plugins.punchline: Hide annoying or distracting VFXs
plugins.description: A plugin which can hide any VFX. Icon by PAPACHIN
plugins.name: EasyEyes

plugins.punchline: Customizable ImGui hotbars
plugins.description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.
plugins.name: QoL Bar

plugins.punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl!
plugins.description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one.
You can choose different image sources, allowing you to look at Catboys, Waifus, Cats, Dogs and more.

Supported APIs:
Twitter, nekos.best, Nekos.life, Catboys, Dog CEO, The Cat API, Pic.re, Waifu.im, Waifu.pics and shibe.online

Warning: You might see naughty images
plugins.name: Neko Fans

plugins.punchline: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.
plugins.description:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Information on the crowdsourced paths is available
at https://rl2.perchbird.dev.
Open the UI with /reslog.
plugins.name: ResLogger2.Plugin

plugins.punchline: This is still mostly a dev tool for debugging, but people like it?
plugins.description: Prefixes all chatbox messages with their chat type number and name, if known.
plugins.name: ChatTyper

plugins.punchline: HP bar, MP bar, EXP bar, oh my!
plugins.description:
A plugin that makes Kingdom Hearts UI stuff, such as a health bar for the player.
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, please post an issue in the github or ping me in the Discord!
plugins.name: Kingdom Hearts UI Bars

plugins.punchline: Play a chime when someone comes into a house.
plugins.description:
Play a chime when someone comes into a house, when they leave or when entering a house people are already inside.

Icon by Flaticon
plugins.name: Doorbell

plugins.punchline: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!
plugins.description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
plugins.name: Which Patch Was That?

plugins.punchline: Pick titles you want in a title roulette.
plugins.description: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".
plugins.name: Title Roulette

plugins.punchline: Making it easier to know where you are.
plugins.description: Movable text overlay of the current location name.
plugins.name: WOLdo

plugins.punchline: You like annoying low HP sounds? This is great for you!
plugins.description:
Plays a sound for certain statuses of the player. Such as low HP or MP.
You will need to provide your own sound files.
plugins.name: Audible Character Status

plugins.punchline: Extra job gauges
plugins.description: Additional job gauges, party buff timers, mitigation trackers, and more. Icon by PAPACHIN
plugins.name: JobBars

plugins.punchline: Improvements to the in-game friend system! Send & receive login and logout notifications with friends and more!
plugins.description:
A plugin to make improvements to the in-game friend system. Includes a client to communicate with the GoodFriend API to send & receive notifications with your friends.

Features:
- Private in design, no identifying information is ever sent about you over the network.
- Send & receive notifications when your friends login and logout*.
- Get notified when your friends use the world visit system.
- Lots of filtering options for various events.

 * Requires friends to also have GoodFriend installed.
plugins.name: GoodFriend

plugins.punchline: Crowdsourced housing alerts and lottery tracking for all.
plugins.description:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.
View the list of all houses available on a world at https://paissadb.zhu.codes/!

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.
plugins.name: PaissaHouse

plugins.punchline: Sync your character data from your main character to all others
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

In-game, use the configuration menu to choose your main character, the restart the game to start syncing!
plugins.name: Character Data Sync

plugins.punchline: Filter any game sound.
plugins.description:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

Icons: filter by Kirby Wu from the Noun Project
and Sound by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
plugins.name: Sound Filter

plugins.punchline: Bard performance assistant
plugins.description:
Assist mode for bards who want to play music but don't know how to.
- does NOT play anything automatically
- needs MIDI files to work
- adapts MIDI tracks to fit in game limitations for you
- you will be scored :O
plugins.name: Harp Hero

plugins.punchline: Automatically mimic the role you're looking for.
plugins.description: Use /mimic to open up the menu and click on the appropriate button to automatically mimic the role you're looking for.
plugins.name: Mimicry Helper

plugins.punchline: Get organized in FFXIV, easily locate/show where to sort items, plan your crafting, and search for mobs, duties, airships, and submarines!
plugins.description:
Allagan Tool's primary purpose is to keep track of items across your characters/retainers/free company. With it's filter system you'll never lose track of items or not know where they should be sorted.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration
	- Item highlighting in inventories when searching/sorting and picking ingredients for crafts
	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things
	- Duty/mob/airship/submarine windows that are fully searchable
	- A filtering system that lets you setup complex searches for specific items 
	- Tooltip integration that'll let you see where the items are on hover
plugins.name: Allagan Tools

plugins.punchline: Helper plugin for Eureka's Logos Actions.
plugins.description: Shows amounts of possible combinations for Eureka's Logos Actions upon entering the Logos Manipulator.
plugins.name: Logogram Helper

plugins.punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other.
plugins.description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro' but this command cannot be used while macros are running.
plugins.name: Macro Chain

plugins.punchline: Customizable, Source Engine-styled position info
plugins.description: Shows your exact position, rotation, and velocity on screen. Based off of the cl_showpos command from the Source Engine.
plugins.name: cl_showpos

plugins.punchline: Removes unwanted icons from your map.
plugins.description: Removes unwanted icons from your map. Not only quests, any icons.
plugins.name: QuestAWAY

plugins.punchline: Legacy and standard movement in one! Move freely!
plugins.description: Hybrid camera/movement mode! Move freely!
plugins.name: Hybrid Camera

plugins.punchline: Save chat logs to your computer as text files or copy them!
plugins.description: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.
plugins.name: XIVLogger

plugins.punchline: Notify and Pop
plugins.description:
Automatically notifies you about NMs in Eureka, with the ability to pop them on a tracker.
Other Features:
- Fairy Finder
- Bunny Timer Window
- Bunny Coffer Helper
- Stats
- Quest Guide (clickable coords)
- - Localized (DE, FR, JA)
plugins.name: Eureka Linker

plugins.punchline: Replace names with job icons, raid role positions and more!
plugins.description:
Adjusts player nameplates base on current content. For example you can display raid positions (that are assigned automatically by listening to the chat), job icons, or names with job icons.

Reverse-engineering effort achieved by authors of JobIcons: haplo, daemitus, Loskh, wozaiha, without them this plugin would not be possible!
plugins.name: Party Icons

plugins.punchline: Eureka Tracker in a plugin with many other features.
plugins.description:
A tool to assist you on your Eureka adventures. Type /eurekahelper to get started.

Features include:
- In-Game Tracker GUI
- Instance Tracker
- Elementals Tracker
- Relic Helper
- Alarms
- Money NM weather timings
- More to come
plugins.name: Eureka Helper

plugins.punchline: Plugin to help with a number of /random and /dice related games.
plugins.description:
Plugin to help with several /random and /dice-related games.

Venue:
    + Concise display of all concurrent players in a list-based format
    + Supports multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to) 
    + Highlight numbers based on regex matching 
DeathRoll:
    + Supports multiple players
    + Automatic checks to prevent number skipping
Tournament (1v1 DeathRoll):
    + Automatic bracket generation with byes to fill uneven
    + Forfeit functionality if a player needs to leave
Blackjack:
    + Automatic reward calculation based on common rules
    + Simplistic, or visual view of cards in play
    + Automatic or manual player-based draw for cards
    + Current players can be seamlessly moved to subsequent rounds
    + Configurable dealer rules (like Soft16)

Extra Features:
    + Block or prevent players from partaking in any game
    + Accept only /random or /dice commands

More features are planned, following user feedback.
plugins.name: Death Roll Helper

plugins.punchline: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.
plugins.description: Uploads market data to market.xivhub.org and other configurable aggregators.
plugins.name: Market Uploader

plugins.punchline: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role.
plugins.description: Recieve a notification when a duty roulette is in need of a role. /pbonus to setup
plugins.name: Adventurer in Need

plugins.punchline: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.
plugins.description: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.
plugins.name: Peeping Tom

plugins.punchline: Customize the Cross Hotbar!
plugins.description:
This plugin provides various customizations for the look and feel of the Cross Hotbar.

-Split up the left/right hotbars
-Display Expanded Hold Controls Separately
-Customize colors and element positions
-Greater control over which sets your extra bars are mapped to
plugins.name: CrossUp

plugins.punchline: Pat counter
plugins.description: Did you ever wonder how many times your Lala gets a pat? Well, now you can count it!
plugins.name: Pat Me

plugins.punchline: Keep track of your FFXIV device's battery.
plugins.description:
Hey, you! Yes, you! Do you play FFXIV on your laptop or Steam Deck? Or are you so addicted to FFXIV that you have a UPS on your desktop just so you can keep playing through power outages? Then this is the plugin for you!

BatteryGauge adds a battery indicator to your server info bar showing your current battery percentage and expected remaining lifespan (as reported by Windows).
plugins.name: BatteryGauge

plugins.punchline: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.
plugins.description:
Allows you to translate player and NPC chat messages/bubbles.
Supported languages include: Pirate, Urianger, Leet, Pig Latin, and Turkey.
plugins.name: SillyChat

plugins.punchline: Time to finish your log?
plugins.description:
Never has it been that easy to finish your hunting log. 

+ List of monsters in the same location based on Rank
+ Clickable coords to open your map on that exact location
+ Clickable dungeon name to open your duty finder
+ Easy to switch between Grand Company and Jobs
+ Automatic selection based on current job
plugins.name: Hunty

plugins.punchline: Customizable ring-shaped hotbars
plugins.description: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets or Macros.
plugins.name: TPie

plugins.punchline: Useful for when you want to quickly export marketboard transaction history.
plugins.description: Copies the marketboard transaction history into your clipboard with configurable options.
plugins.name: Easy MBHistory

plugins.punchline: Enables in-game chat bubbles.
plugins.description: Using native chat bubble display, see who is talking about what in a more natural fashion.
plugins.name: Chat Bubbles

plugins.punchline: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.
plugins.description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.
plugins.name: ezFauxHollows

plugins.punchline: Live monster data for Deep Dungeons.
plugins.description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon.
Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics.
Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played.
Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Original by Strati
plugins.name: DeepDungeonDex

plugins.punchline: Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.
plugins.description:
Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat.
Opens map with given coordinates for current or given zone.
See "/coord" for configuration and usage info.
plugins.name: ChatCoordinates

plugins.punchline: Track who used what emotes on you.
plugins.description: Adds a window logging all emotes used on you, so you never miss a sneaky dote again.
plugins.name: Emote log

plugins.punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!
plugins.description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted.
plugins.name: RepairMe

plugins.punchline: Mo' actions no problems
plugins.description: This plugin lets you target friends or enemies like a macro, without the clunkiness of a macro. /pmoaction opens the configuration.
plugins.name: Mouseover Action

plugins.punchline: Shows the next best move in Mini Cactpot.
plugins.description: This plugin highlights tiles and lines in MiniCactpot that represent the best potential action you can take.
plugins.name: ezMiniCactpot

plugins.punchline: Want to record a crafting rotation and export it as a macro? Look no further!
plugins.description: Records a crafting rotation you start and provides a way to export it to a macro so you can reutilize it.
plugins.name: Macro Recorded

plugins.punchline: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
plugins.description: Gives the value of current targets health in Stormtalons from the dead game Wildstar.
plugins.name: Stormtalons

plugins.punchline: Switches your /hudlayout when your game switches from windowed to fullscreen.
plugins.description:
Useful for ultrawide users, swapping from windowed/fullscreen will automatically switch your hudlayout.

/pah to configure
plugins.name: Adaptive Hud

plugins.punchline: Find anything, go anywhere, in style.
plugins.description:
Adds a convenient quick search akin to Spotlight that lets you open game windows, teleport, find wiki articles, and more.
Press Control + T to open the search window. This can be changed by searching for "Wotsit Settings".
plugins.name: Wotsit

plugins.punchline: Save and swap your glamour plates.
plugins.description:
Create and save as many glamour plates as you want. Activate up to 15 of them
at once at the Glamour Dresser. Supports exporting and importing plates for
easy sharing.
plugins.name: Glamaholic

plugins.punchline: Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.
plugins.description:
Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Support for:
- Any plain text URL
- Pastebin.com
- carrd.co/crd.co
- F-List
- Refsheet

Simply examine someone with a search info containing pointers to one of
these locations and the plugin will display information automatically.

Icon: expand by Gregor Cresnar from the Noun Project
plugins.name: Expanded Search Info

plugins.punchline: Automatically backup your game and plugin configuration.
plugins.description: This plugin automatically backups your game and plugin configurations upon game/plugin starting.
plugins.name: JustBackup

plugins.punchline: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
plugins.description: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.
plugins.name: Text Box Styler

plugins.punchline: Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft.
plugins.description:
Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft

Features:
- Minimalistic interface that can be scaled down to become part of your HUD.
- Player context menu items, like sending tells, examining, searching on the Lodestone and more.
- Customizable colours & behaviour.
- Integration support with other plugins via IPC.
plugins.name: Wholist

plugins.punchline: Play sounds and highlight text based on defined filters.
plugins.name: ChatAlerts

plugins.punchline: Shows the destination zone's concept art while loading
plugins.description:
This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.
NOTE: ONLY LOOKS RIGHT ON 16:9 SCREENS! The concept art is not any bigger, and we can't expand/fix it. Sorry!
plugins.name: Fancy Loading Screens

plugins.punchline: Monodimensional compass for your adventures.
plugins.description:
Check-out the repository for steps on how to report missing/wrong filter
and hiding options. Have a look at the FAQ tab in the config window
after install for common caveats.
plugins.name: Compass

plugins.punchline: Customized titles for you and yours.
plugins.description: Assign custom titles to players.
plugins.name: Honorific

plugins.punchline: Triple triad solver
plugins.description:
Triple triad solver, NPC matches only.
- highlights next move during mini game
- evaluates all deck presets before match
- deck optimizer for NPC
- adds more details to card collection window
plugins.name: TriadBuddy

plugins.punchline: Optimize Island Sanctuary Workshop orders.
plugins.description: Use /wso after you visited your island.
plugins.name: Workshop Optimizer Plugin

plugins.punchline: Explore quests and their rewards.
plugins.description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Icons: treasure map by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project and
locked book by Anthony Ledoux from the Noun Project
plugins.name: Quest Map

plugins.punchline: Color your FC member’s FC tags
plugins.description:
Color your FC’s tag or the entire nameplate if they are in your FC or other specified FCs.
Works using Lodestone data, so it can continue working inside duties as well as on different servers!
plugins.name: FC Name Color

plugins.punchline: Displays information about housing fixtures and objects.
plugins.description:
Housemate offers multiple features that help you gain inspiration from other homes in XIV.
If you're looking for a specific home or outdoor item, you can check the exterior list
when running around a ward. If you're interested in seeing what items make up a
structure in a home - turn on the item overlay to see what they are!

Note: This plugin is purely informational, and does not assist you in placing
or "glitching" housing items.
plugins.name: Housemate

plugins.punchline: Tilt the camera, not yourself.
plugins.description: Automatically adjusts the Third Person Camera Angle/Distance given certain conditions.
plugins.name: Tilted

plugins.punchline: Shows you where to buy vendor items
plugins.description: Adds a context menu option for items that will show you where to find items you can buy off a vendor
plugins.name: Item Vendor Location

plugins.punchline: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.
plugins.description:
Orchestrion Plugin allows you to change the currently playing in-game BGM. It includes
a curated list of the most accurate in-game song titles, so you know exactly what's playing,
if you want to know later! Add favorite songs to separate them from the rest.
Note: This plugin does not currently allow you to play actual orchestrion songs.
plugins.name: Orchestrion Plugin

plugins.punchline: Complete combat countdown, pull timer and OBS overlay
plugins.description:
Finally, display all the numbers when starting a countdown!
Comes with an accurate pull timer that starts when you or any of your party members enter combat.

Features :
- Big countdown that displays all the numbers
- Customizable big-number textures (default, yellow, WoW style or custom files)
- Display combat time in the Server Info Bar, and/or a floating window
- OBS browser-source compatible page with countdown and current combat duration

Why the OBS thing ? Well, it can be useful if you want a big stylized stopwatch in your recordings.
See repository for more info.

Feel free so send me feedback, bugs and potential improvements!
plugins.name: EngageTimer

plugins.punchline: Warns you when yourself or others are missing role-specific actions
plugins.description:
Displays warnings when you or any party members are missing role specific actions such as partner buffs, pets, and tank stances.

/nty help → Display all available commands
plugins.name: No Tank You

plugins.punchline: Send game info over MQTT
plugins.description: Send data to an MQTT broker to do all sorts of things. Change your lights with a macro, turn on the heater when you use Overheat, or start playing Rules of Nature when you switch to Gunbreaker. Requires an MQTTv5 compatible broker.
plugins.name: FFXIV2MQTT

plugins.punchline: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.
plugins.description:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
plugins.name: Tippy

plugins.punchline: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.
plugins.description:
Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
plugins.name: Player Tags

plugins.punchline: Track your loot.
plugins.description:
Kapture is a loot tracker to capture drops, obtained items, rolls, and more.
Use the roll monitor to see who you are waiting on to roll.
plugins.name: Kapture

plugins.punchline: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu
plugins.description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you
plugins.name: Target Furniture

plugins.punchline: Use advanced Party Finder filter presets.
plugins.description:
Filter the party finder better.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)
plugins.name: Better Party Finder

plugins.punchline: Simple Submarine Tracker and Builder
plugins.description:
Simple and Easy
+ Tracks current builds, routes and times
+ Loot overview for each FC 
+ Builder to improve your builds
+ Save and load builds
+ Optimized EXP calculator for the selected build
+ Unlockable exploration points are highlighted
+ Breakpoint support
+ Configurable notification for returning subs
+ Helper with lots of useful information
+ Support for multiple FCs
plugins.name: Submarine Tracker

plugins.punchline: Add separators to various numbers.
plugins.description:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips
plugins.name: The Great Separator

plugins.punchline: Reveals your hitbox, with customisable features.
plugins.description: Showing exactly where to stand since 2020.
plugins.name: Pixel Perfect

plugins.punchline: Create vibration patterns for the controller and specify triggers to make it vibrate.
plugins.description:
You need to configure patterns and triggers before it will work, 
open the configuration window to do that.  

For DualSense/Shock4 support, the controller needs to be connected wired (same as the game's)
and there can only be one of a type connected (e.g., only one DualSense, not two).

Currently supported triggers are:
- Cooldowns
- Near Aether Current
plugins.name: GentleTouch

plugins.punchline: Record the maplinks in chat
plugins.description: Automatically record the maplinks in chat and retrieval later.
plugins.name: MapLinker

plugins.punchline: See chat messages from your current target in a separate window.
plugins.description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.
plugins.name: Snooper

plugins.punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.
plugins.description:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
plugins.name: Tidy Chat

plugins.punchline: Because tracking your DoTs shouldn't be difficult.
plugins.description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list. Original implementation credit to aers.
plugins.name: EnemyListDebuffs

plugins.punchline: Improve your Bozja sufferring. Maybe.
plugins.description:
Features:
• Info about Lost Actions, Fragments, FATEs/CE, Field Notes e.g. location, drops, marketboard price, fate chains, mettle rewards, exp rewards, etc. Options to copy the info to clipboard, then paste it on chat.
• Weather forecast.
• Alarms based on time, weather, and FATE/CE.
• Custom loadouts planning, saving, and sharing. Featuring recommended loadouts from many communities.
• Overlay for Lost Find Cache. Filterable by name, role, fragment, weight, and Custom Loadout of choice.
• View Bozja stats and Cache from anywhere. Customisable alert for actions that are running low.
• Delubrum Reginae (Savage) resources and communities.
plugins.name: Bozja Buddy

plugins.punchline: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname
plugins.description: A simple tool to record players' used names and nickname base on SocialList. Right click on the target to add/sub/check the used names and nickname.
plugins.name: Used Name

plugins.punchline: Track things inside Deep Dungeons (Solo only).
plugins.description:
-Keep track of the number of kills, coffers opened, regeneration potions consumed, potsherds obtained, total time and more.
-Examine the collected data.
-Scoring.
plugins.name: Deep Dungeon Tracker

plugins.punchline: A Plugin that lets you add notes to item Tooltips
plugins.description: Right-click any item in your inventory to start adding a note,or make a label in the config window to start adding your own labels
plugins.name: TooltipNotes

plugins.punchline: Witty commentary to the brilliant things you do.
plugins.description: Check /narrator for full options or use /narratorvolume to set volume manually.
plugins.name: Stanley Parable XIV

plugins.punchline: Allows you to use the duty recorder
plugins.description: Adds additional features to the duty recorder and automatically starts it in most instances.
plugins.name: A Realm Recorded

plugins.punchline: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.
plugins.name: Weatherman

plugins.punchline: This was supposed to be simple...
plugins.description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)
plugins.name: Simple Tweaks Plugin

plugins.punchline: A direct message manager made in fashion of WoW Instant Messenger.
plugins.description:
Features:
- Opes a direct message window when you message someone or they message you
- Each window contains your DM chat with certain person
- Open and cycle through recent chats with a hotkey
- Execute emote commands on a player from their DM window without needing to manually target them
- Automatically record your chat log in an easy to read text file
- Fully customizable styles
plugins.name: XIV Instant Messenger

plugins.punchline: Support for ukrainian characters.
plugins.description: Support for ukrainian characters in text chat and input field. Gaming4Eternity Ukrainian Community - https://gaming4eternity.online
plugins.name: G4E UkrChatSupport

plugins.punchline: Take total control over your HUD.
plugins.description:
- Save infinite HUD layouts
- Edit your HUD with precision
- Automatically swap between HUD layouts based on conditions
- Make child layouts that only affect desired HUD elements
- Change visibility of job gauges
- Export and import layouts from text
plugins.name: HUD Manager

plugins.punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs
plugins.description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects
	- [Experimental] Eureka Elementals (by apetih) 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
plugins.name: Aether Compass

plugins.punchline: Mod to allow VR
plugins.description:
Mod to allow vr. Requires SteamVR Not the steam version of the game
** Requires SteamVR **
Please click the globe icon for detailed instructions.
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
plugins.name: XIVR - VR Mod

plugins.punchline: Game window resizing plugin. Ever wanted to take 8K screenshots on 144p screen? Now you can.
plugins.description:
Set your game window to arbitrary size not limited by your display resolution. Mostly useful for taking high-resolution screenshots without going fullscreen and using DSR/FSR.
Requires borderless or windowed mode.
plugins.name: XIVWindowResizer

plugins.punchline: Play the OOF! sound on fall and/or death. The Only Plugin You Need!
plugins.description:
i love roblox!!! 
           
craaazzzy features
  - oof on party & alliance deaths!
  - use custom mp3 sounds! 
  - DBO� (Distance Based Oof)!
  - instant access to the hour long documentary on oof by hbomberguy!
  - fully featured settings window!
plugins.name: OOF!

plugins.punchline: Hey guys, Famous YouTuber here. Do you ever get Collector's Anxiety?
plugins.description: Collector's Anxiety helps completionists or players with a hobby for collecting in-game things keep track of what they do or don't have in an easy-to-use checklist format. Data is loaded live from the game, so collection statuses are updated in real-time.
plugins.name: Collector's Anxiety

plugins.punchline: Save and load camera presets in Group Pose
plugins.description:
Ever wished you could save multiple camera presets at any given time? I know I have. Well, this plugin lets you save as many as you want!

*Only useable within Group Pose.*
plugins.name: Camera Loader

plugins.punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for sprouts & doing your daily roulettes!
plugins.description:
Comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids.

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat user interface that scales well at small sizes
- A short-text mode for easier reading & accessibility
- Anti-spoiler protections by default
- Built-in guide editor
- Integrations with your favourite plugins
& more to come!

plugins.punchline: Make borderless window mode work well with aero shortcuts
plugins.description: Borderless window can now be properly minimized (by clicking on taskbar or by win+down shortcut); when moved between monitors (win+shift+left/right), resolution is updated automatically.

plugins.punchline: Reduces the refresh rate of movement physics, "fixing" it at high fps.
plugins.description:
Causes the game's physics to work at higher FPS by making it update every few frames. 
Toggle with '/physics t', or use on/off instead of t. 
May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values. 
Disabling the entire plugin after turning on/off with /physics requires reboot to reenable.

plugins.punchline: Simple item comparison

plugins.punchline: Remember to check your posture!
plugins.description: Configurable reminders to hydrate and maintain a healthy posture.

plugins.punchline: Shows your gear in the Fitting Room by default.

Normally the Fitting Room defaults to showing you just the piece of gear you’re trying on. This plugin inverts that behaviour: when you launch the game, the Fitting Room (plus Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection) will show all your gear by default.

NB: there are some oddities to how Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection behave when this plugin is doing its thing. If you’d rather it not touch those windows at all, there’s an option for that (and more details about the problem) in the settings.

plugins.punchline: Speak to your Japanese friend!

plugins.punchline: Sup y'all? It's ya boy, Twitch XIV, and today we're gonna be playing some final fantasy fourteen.
plugins.description: Allows you to join a Twitch chat and send messages and (optionally) have the twitch chat come through your chatbox.

An actually updated Mumble positional audio plugin. Because people still use Mumble... right?
Enable "Link to Game and Transmit Position" and the Link plugin in your Mumble settings.
Do NOT enable the Final Fantasy XIV plugin - it's unrelated to Linkpearl.
Make sure Mumble is open when the plugin loads, or you'll have to re-enable it.

plugins.description:
[Incomplete Plugin] Mappy's intended feature set is mostly implemented, some features do not work as intended, most work well.

Open settings with /wmm

If stuff breaks, let me know - click Send Feedback (speech bubble icon) below this text.

Allows you to use Dalamud via Python in the chat box.

Supports one-liners, printing results to chat, or making full scripts over multiple commands.

plugins.punchline: Adds a better macro system to the game.
plugins.name: Macrology
plugins.description:
Adds a better macro system to the game.

Macrology allows for macros of infinite length, adds looping,
allows comments, supports pausing, allows you to run multiple
macros at once, and supports fractional waits.

plugins.punchline: The Roleplayer's Toolbox
plugins.description:
A collection of useful tools for roleplayers.

- Choose a PF or use the /route command to set a destination and get
  told the fastest way to navigate to any house.
- Enable click-to-examine on left or right click.
- Prevent untargeting or changing your target.
- Set any emote on your hotbar, such as sleep or object sit.
- Add the /emoteid command to use any emote by its ID.
- Disable the /doze emote snap so you can use the sleep emote
  anywhere.
plugins.name: The Roleplayer's Toolbox

plugins.punchline: Queue up crafts! Set and forget!
plugins.name: Mastercraft
plugins.description:
Mastercraft will handle your tedious crafting for you. Import rotations with
specific food and pot, then queue up all the crafts you need. Mastercraft
automatically refreshes food and pots as necessary, and it crafts faster than
a macro ever could!

- Pauseable queue system for crafts
- Byregot's protection on specialists with delineations (optional)
- Skip quality actions when quality is already maxed (optional)
- Macro importer
- Pre-queue sanity checks (have stats, have gearset, have food, etc.)
- Fastest possible crafting time
- View all crafter gearset stats on one screen
- Automatically switch job, use food/pot, start craft
- Can use your computer (and to a lesser degree your game) while it runs

plugins.punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs
plugins.description:
[Important!] Please disable AND uninstall any non-preview version if you'd like to install this version.

This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yomishino/MyDalamudPlugins/main/plugins.json)
plugins.name: Aether Compass [Preview] [Aku API 7]

Punti Chiave: 1) Apre la guida (se presente) in maniera automatica quando si entra in duty. 2)Tabella delle meccaniche con funzionalità di mostra / nascondi. 3)Le guide possono essere localizzate anche in diverse lingue. 4)Le guide si aggiornano in maniera indipendente dal plugin stesso. 5)Protezione spoiler integrata. E tanto altro.
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ffxivita/XIVITADalamudPlugins/main/dist/pluginmaster.json)
plugins.name: XIVITAGuide [Aku API 7]

plugins.punchline: Il migliore strumento per la vostra isola!
plugins.description:
Un plugin che migliora la vostra esperienza in  Island Sanctuary. Cosa Fa: 1) Vi segnala gli item da raccogliere nella mappa 2) todo-list per Gathering & crafting, mostrando quali di materiali avrete bisogno 3) (pianificato) Miglior vista dell'inventario. 4) Widget per accedere velocemente alle informazioni.
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ffxivita/XIVITADalamudPlugins/main/dist/pluginmaster.json)
plugins.name: XIVITASanctuary [Aku API 7]

plugins.punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
plugins.description:
Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).
 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daemitus/MyDalamudPlugins/master/pluginmaster.json)
plugins.name: Yes Already [Aku API 7]

plugins.punchline: Splatoon plugin is an accessibility tool for Final Fantasy XIV.
plugins.description: Splatoon plugin is an accessibility tool for Final Fantasy XIV. It provides a custom waymark system and allows to create infinite grouped waymarks, labels and actor indicators with pixel precision, enabling player to see important objects and events easier and react to them faster. Plugin does not comes with any preconfigured presets, you are required to either make them or import them.
